name: Electric Jezebel
description:
Description:
You are trapped in the system. Your arm has changed, but you can use it to push the game screen to manipulate the existence of other objects in the system. If they are not visible, they do not exist. Navigate the system with your newfound power.

With art and music by the wonderful Stevie Galliart. Go check out her work.

Controls:
← and → arrow keys: Run
Spacebar: Jump
↓ arrow key: Interact with objects (Doors, teleporters, switches, etc.)

Jam Details:
This game was made in 3 days for the Ludum Dare 31 Jam in December of 2014. The theme of the jam was "Entire Game on One Screen." The game received the following rankings:

CategoryRank (out of 1267 entries)Score (out of 5)Overall2893.46Audio2303.37Innovation2653.45Graphics3003.68Fun3193.29Mood3273.29Humor6932.21Theme7063.31
